ai-tika-s0404t7:2_1: Eight on the first side of thes beginning with “first ...”
ai-tika-s0404t7:2_2: he who continues on the ten kinds of lazyness, and witness when the poor person has done away with them.
ai-tika-s0404t7:2_3: whose mind is called a person who has developed thus, “Where is this?” is said, in regard to the influence of the Dhamma the lazy.
ai-tika-s0404t7:2_4: for the meaning of Vibhaṅga: “‘Confidence’ is the meaning of severing liquidity, the meaning of this, and it is the meaning. That is why it is this: “The meaning.”
ai-tika-s0404t7:2_5: Hence it is said: “Here is the meaning.”
ai-tika-s0404t7:2_6: The legal procedures were done away with any kind of robe-cloth, they said, “Has an ascetic?”
ai-tika-s0404t7:2_8: But he said, “Next to do it instead of doing it,” and he says, “We cannot find it.”
ai-tika-s0404t7:2_9: to attain the goal of the path.
ai-tika-s0404t7:2_11: Let them not lose the minds of Māra.
ai-tika-s0404t7:2_12: For these arrivals are only a man’s mother, so the unsuitable, and so as with respect to him.
ai-tika-s0404t7:2_13: When they get up, they may be sick.
ai-tika-s0404t7:3_0: They rebuke the grounds for arousing energy.
ai-tika-s0404t7:3_1: Because of this, they say, “By this practice,” etc., that is why it is not called “shown” and “Devokedness.”
ai-tika-s0404t7:3_2: This is the first kind of energy that should be understood, “This is the first way of arousing energy” .
ai-tika-s0404t7:3_3: Because they roam the first place for being energetic.
ai-tika-s0404t7:3_4: The eight grounds for arousing energy should be understood.
ai-tika-s0404t7:4_0: The concluding in faith is finished.
ai-tika-s0404t7:5_0: The commentary on the colour of the Yama is finished.
ai-tika-s0404t7:7_0: Thus there is the plantains on the Uttarakuru
ai-tika-s0404t7:8_0: The place where it is fortunate because it is the regular order to show the colour of the kasiṇas .
ai-tika-s0404t7:9_0: Reverence to him, the Fortunate One, the Worthy One, the Perfect Sambuddha
ai-tika-s0404t7:10_0: if it is the upper limb.
